description: Manage IP tunnel interfaces on Solaris/illumos systems.

temporary.description: Specifies that the IP tunnel interface is temporary. Temporary IP tunnel interfaces do not persist across reboots.

remote_address.description: Literal IP address or hostname corresponding to the tunnel destination.

local_address.description: Literat IP address or hostname corresponding to the tunnel source.

type.description: Specifies the type of tunnel to be created.
